description: Leading product strategy for AI/ML platform features. Working with engineering teams to translate customer signals into focused roadmaps. Focused on developer experience and enterprise capabilities.
Built product strategy from zero to one. Launched MVP platform that scaled to 100+ enterprise customers. Managed cross-functional teams including engineering, design, and data science.
Helped startups and scale-ups define product strategy and build MVPs. Worked across industries including fintech, healthcare, and SaaS. Delivered product roadmaps and user research.
